title: Coastal Escape in Bejaïa
description: Discover the stunning Mediterranean coastline of Bejaïa, rich with history, hidden coves, and Kabyle culture.
activities: Local cuisine tasting in the old medina

title: Mountain Adventures in Sétif
description: Explore the highlands of Sétif, where Roman ruins meet modern charm and nature provides a breath of fresh air.

title: Seaside Serenity in Skikda
description: Enjoy the relaxed atmosphere of Skikda, known for its wide beaches, colonial architecture, and vibrant sea life.
activities: Exploring colonial buildings and the Roman theater
